segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman is while the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just polishing that plate, completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that wobbly stool, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, like it’s the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for the woman to notice the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor must be so slippery by now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt from all this water and the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is like a time bomb waiting to go off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t look away, even though it’s making me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR
